alert.note: Alert for Northern Sangre de Cristo Mountains (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albuquerque (Northern and Central New Mexico)
info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued February 22 at 3:07PM MST until February 24 at 5:00AM MST by NWS Albuquerque
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL 5 AM MST THURSDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow and blowing snow. Additional snow accumulations between 3 and 6 inches, locally up to 10 inches above 9,000 feet. Winds gusting as high as 40 mph. * WHERE...Northern Sangre de Cristo Mountains. * WHEN...Until 5 AM MST Thursday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult to impossible. Tire chains may be necessary if traveling through mountain passes. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Winds will create blowing and drifting snow and poor visibility.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. For the latest road conditions, dial 511 or 1.800.432.4269, or visit http://nmroads.com.
